DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to investigate the advantages of using AlignRT, a commercially available, FDA approved camera-based imaging system for proton therapy patients prior to and during their radiation treatment delivery.
DOC.brief_title: Camera Based System to Monitor Patient Movement During Radiation Treatment
DOC.criteria: Patients with tumors of the brain, head and neck, thorax, upper abdomen, posterior spine/sacrum and extremities
